CHS is home to the only Veterinary Assisting program in the county. Students in the Veterinary Assisting program have the opportunity to pursue their interest in the field of Veterinary Science including small and large animal care. Students in this program become part of a veterinary learning community that provides students with unique learning opportunities including internships and career shadowing that help improve student motivation and achievement. This comprehensive program combines rigorous academic curriculum with various and related clinical experiences.
